spam_exercise¶

Spam Exercise (Qn 2)

@author: Bhishan Poudel

@date: Nov 14, 2017

@email: bhishanpdl@gmail.com

count lines: wc -l file.txt Get first char of lines of file: cut -c 1 file.txt | head
